about_the_game:
You woke up in an abandoned space station
You need to somehow try to get out of this inhospitable place that is teeming with dangerous creatures

Features

  • Auto-firing main and secondary weapons
  • Semi-automatic laser turrets: your only allies that differ from map to map
  • One active skill — jetpack dash
  • Many jet backpacks to choose from with different slots, stats and mechanics!
  • Free stats upgrades after every level up
  • A lot of items available to buy in the shop between waves
  • Waves system with rounds 20-100 sec

name: Laser Survivor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB, OpenGL 3+
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Laser Survivor is a top-down rogue-lite shooter where you play as an astronaut stranded on a space station, you can choose one primary weapon, one jetpack which has slots for weapons and modifiers, and indeed your laser turrets which will help you during the run. Build your way to survive.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Swedish
